name: OneWed
tag_list: social-media, social-networking, weddings, bridal, blog, fashion, local-business
overview: OneWed is the ultimate online source for the truth in wedding planning, providing couples with a wealth of tips, advice, and creative suggestions to help personalize their wedding experience. WeddingPreParty.com, is a virtual way for couples to start the celebration early and keep in contact with guests through a social wedding planning network. OneWed boasts the largest directory of local wedding vendors with 235,000 nationwide. Additionally, the site features OneWed’s Savvy Scoop Wedding Blog, online wedding checklist, free wedding websites and ideas for everything from engagement rings to wedding flowers to wedding dresses. OneWed can be found online at OneWed.com, facebook.com/Wedding.Planning, and twitter.com/OneWed.
